### `0: formatted`

```
class Hello extends React.Component {
	componentDidUpdate() {
		this.setState({
			name: "John",
		});
	}
}
```

```
class Hello extends React.Component {
	componentDidUpdate() {
		if (condition) {
			this.setState({
				name: "John",
			});
		}
	}
}
```
